name: LUDO, family board game
description:
LUDO is the best way to spend quality time with your family!
It is a game you will fall in love with. You can play with up to 4 friends or robots if you are alone.

Download 'Ludo Dice' from App Store on your iPhone or iPad and use it as an extra remote controller for playing Ludo.


LUDO family board game is also available for iPad!


HAVE FUN!
